title: Hollyoaks star Stephanie Davis unveils all-new brunette hairstyle
text:
From Digital Spy

Hollyoaks star Stephanie Davis is a blonde no more!

The Sinead O'Connor actress was known for many years for her raven hair, until going for a more sunkissed blonde look over the last several months. From what we gather, she wasn't thrilled with the change.



Davis made a promise to her fans on Instagram that she was "never going blonde again" on Wednesday (October 9) while revealing that she'd returned to her iconic brunette locks.

Photo credit: @stephaniedavis88 - Instagram More

Photo credit: @stephaniedavis88 - Instagram More

"Back to black," she wrote in the caption. "Thank you to my amazing Josh for getting me back to the real me! Brunette Alwaysss💪🏼 Never going blonde again No Thankyou."

This switch back from blonde to brunette was a huge hit with her fans, with Instagram followers commenting that they'd "missed" her dark hair and telling her it "suits [her] perfectly".

Photo credit: @stephaniedavis88 - Instagram More

The hair transformation comes during a time of transition in Davis's personal and professional life, following the recent news that she'd ended her relationship with Hollyoaks co-star Owen Warner.

However, there was a huge professional achievement this week when Davis won the Best Actress prize at the Inside Soap Awards for her comeback year as Sinead.

Davis has received huge acclaim from fans for her performances in Storm Week, Sinead's abusive marriage storyline and her current romance with Sami Maalik.
